title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: The Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project option is not visible.
EB: The Open Project and Close Project options should both be visible in the menu when multiple projects are selected.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: Create two projects, P1 and P2. Select P2 and attempt to close it.
